title: swiftDialog Features

listitem.title: Display web content, videos or images either locally or pass in a URL
Customizable Title, Message, Window, Banner, Icon, Buttons etc
Capture user input with user input fields.
Built in builder function to easily create dialogs
Display lists of items with customizable icons and text
Create timers and dynamic progress bars
Simple help buttons to display help information
